taskbody.prereq: You must already have imported application from T24. You need to have Helptext XML files accessible from your machine.

step.cmd:
Select
File Import Design Studio - Import T24 Helptext
Click on the Browse button and select the folder containing all helptext XML files.
step.info: The BrowserWeb.war can be found in the ..\jboss\standalone\deployments folder of your TAFC and TAFJ installation. Open the archive and view the helpParameters.xml. The <viewLocation/> tag gives the helptext folder location.
step.stepresult: All XML files found under the selected folder are displayed in the selection preview.

step.cmd: Select the files you want to import. For a global selection, click on the Select All button.
Click on Next and select the DS project model where you want the helptext to be imported. The import process will automatically find applications within the project.

taskbody.result: The selected files are proceeded, updating domain models with documentation on corresponding application classes and attributes. Importing Helptext takes a long time.
